attributes.action: not give control of military overseas bases to the EU.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A recent EU policy document says “Member states of the EU would benefit from placing their overseas military installations and maritime power at the crux of ESDP.” This means the Falklands Islands and Gibralter bases would become EU controlled. However, I do not have faith in this governments backbone to stand up to the EU and feel it will give in to it as on so many other issues.
